author: Crystal Bell
title: Alan Yang Embraced His Identity And Directed Tigertail In Three Languages
description: Alan Yang's 'Tigertail' is a multigenerational story inspired by his Taiwanese father's own immigration from Taiwan to the United States. But the Netflix drama is also about family and how, as the child of immigrants, 'you feel split in between worlds,' the w…
content: Alan Yang's Tigertail begins with a young boy running through the rice fields of occupied Taiwan. He sees a chimerical vision of his parents in the distance his father, who died when he was an infant, and his mother, who left him with his grandparents to find… [+12842 chars]
